setup_script_description: sets focus on and expands the combobox, sets the combobox value to 'a', and de-selects all text in the input
task: narrow down matching options in filled in expanded combobox
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the combobox, type a character to narrow down the number of matching options in the listbox popup.
output_assertions: Text of the automatically completed option ('Alabama') is conveyed
State of the text in the input (selected) is conveyed
